00035 MainWindow::MainWindow(QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QMainWindow(parent, f){

00190 void MainWindow::clearTmp(){
00191   QString fileName = QDir::homePath();
00192   fileName.append("/.config/");
00193   fileName.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00194   fileName.append("/tmp/");
00195 
00196   QDir dir(fileName);
00197   dir.setFilter(QDir::Files | QDir::Hidden | QDir::NoSymLinks);
00198 
00199   QFileInfoList list = dir.entryInfoList();
00200   for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00201       QFile(list.at(i).absoluteFilePath()).remove();
00202   }
00203   return;
00204 }
00205 
00206 void MainWindow::startDrop(QList<QUrl> files){
00207   //QList<QUrl> list = event->mimeData()->urls();
00208   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
00209 
00210   if (!treeItem)
00211       return;
00212 
00213   bool ok;
00214   QString file, fileName;
00215   QStringList list1;
00216 
00217   QString dir_name, prefix_name;
00218 
00219   if (treeItem->parent()){
00220       prefix_name = treeItem->parent()->text(0);
00221       dir_name = treeItem->text(0);
00222   } else {
00223       prefix_name = treeItem->text(0);
00224       dir_name = "";
00225   }
00226 
00227   for (int i=0; i < files.length(); i++){
00228       if (files.at(i).toLocalFile().contains(".exe", Qt::CaseInsensitive) || files.at(i).toLocalFile().contains(".bat", Qt::CaseInsensitive) || files.at(i).toLocalFile().contains(".com", Qt::CaseInsensitive)){
00229         file = files.at(i).toLocalFile();
00230 
00231         list1 = file.split("/");
00232         fileName=list1.last().left(list1.last().length() - list1.last().split(".").last().length() - 1);
00233 
00234         while (db_icon->isExistsByName(prefix_name, dir_name, fileName)){
00235             fileName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Sorry. It seems icon already exists."), tr("Sorry. It seems icon already exists.<br>Please rename it, or cancel paste operation."), QLineEdit::Normal, iconBuffer.names.at(i) , &ok);
00236             if (!ok){
00237               return;
00238             }
00239         }
00240 
00241         if (files.at(i).toLocalFile().contains(".bat", Qt::CaseInsensitive)){
00242             file = "--backend=user ";
00243             file.append(CoreLib->getWinePath(files.at(i).toLocalFile(), "-w"));
00244             db_icon->addIcon(file, "wineconsole", "", "", prefix_name, dir_name, fileName, "", "", "", "", file.left(file.length() - file.split("/").last().length()), "", 0);
00245         } else {
00246             db_icon->addIcon("", file, "", "", prefix_name, dir_name, fileName, "", "", "", "", file.left(file.length() - file.split("/").last().length()), "", 0);
00247         }
00248       }
00249   }
00250   twPrograms_ItemClick(treeItem, 0);
00251 }

00253 void MainWindow::startDrag (){
00254   QString fileName;
00255   QList<QListWidgetItem *> items = lstIcons->selectedItems ();
00256 
00257   if (items.count()>0){
00258       QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
00259 
00260       if (!treeItem)
00261         return;
00262 
00263       QMimeData *mimeData = new QMimeData;
00264       QList<QUrl> urls;
00265 
00266       for (int i=0; i<items.count(); i++){
00267         if (treeItem->parent()){
00268             fileName = CoreLib->createDesktopFile(treeItem->parent()->text(0), treeItem->text(0), items.at(i)->text());
00269         } else {
00270             fileName = CoreLib->createDesktopFile(treeItem->text(0), "", items.at(i)->text());
00271         }
00272         urls<<QUrl::fromLocalFile(fileName);
00273       }
00274       mimeData->setUrls(urls);
00275       QDrag *drag = new QDrag(this);
00276       drag->setMimeData(mimeData);
00277       drag->setPixmap(items.at(0)->icon().pixmap(32));
00278       drag->start(Qt::MoveAction);
00279   }
00280 
00281   return;
00282 }

00299 void MainWindow::cmdWinetricks_Click() {
00300 #ifndef WITH_WINETOOLS
00301   QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("<p>q4wine was compiled without winetriks support.</p><p>If you wish to enable winetriks support add:</p><p> \"-DWITH_WINETOOLS=ON\" to cmake arguments.</p>"));
00302 #else
00303   QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("<p>Winetricks officaly NOT supported by q4wine.</p><p>There was some repports about bugs, slows and errors on winetriks and q4wine usage at same time.</p>"));
00304 
00305   if (CoreLib->getSetting("console", "bin").toString().isEmpty()){
00306       QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("<p>You do not set default console binary.</p><p>Set it into q4wine option dialog.</p>"));
00307       return;
00308   }
00309   winetricks *w = new winetricks (cbPrefixes->currentText());
00310   w->exec();
00311 #endif
00312 
00313   return;
00314 }

00316 void MainWindow::trayIcon_Activate(QSystemTrayIcon::ActivationReason reason){
00317   if (reason==QSystemTrayIcon::Trigger){
00318       if (!isVisible()){
00319         setMeVisible(TRUE);
00320       } else {
00321         setMeVisible(FALSE);
00322       }
00323   }
00324   return;
00325 }

00327 void MainWindow::lstIcons_ItemClick(QListWidgetItem * item){
00328   /*
00329        * This is function for selection icons, and displaying
00330        * icon informationm like path and description
00331        */
00332 
00333   if (!item)
00334       return;
00335 
00336   if (!twPrograms->currentItem()){
00337       lstIcons->clear();
00338       return;
00339   }
00340 
00341   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
00342   QStringList result;
00343 
00344   if (treeItem->parent()){
00345       result=db_icon->getByName(treeItem->parent()->text(0), treeItem->text(0), item->text());
00346   } else {
00347       result=db_icon->getByName(treeItem->text(0), "", item->text());
00348   }
00349 
00350   lblInfo->setText(tr("Program: %1<br> Description: %2").arg(result.at(1)) .arg(result.at(2)));
00351   return;
00352 }

00354 void MainWindow::getSettings(){
00355   /*
00356        * Getting application settings
00357        */
00358   QVariant val;
00359 
00360   val = CoreLib->getSetting("MainWindow", "size", false, QSize(400, 450));
00361   this->resize(val.toSize());
00362   val = CoreLib->getSetting("MainWindow", "pos", false, QPoint(200, 200));
00363   this->move(val.toPoint());
00364 
00365   QList<int> a;
00366   a.append(CoreLib->getSetting("MainWindow", "splitterSize0", false, 170).toInt());
00367   a.append(CoreLib->getSetting("MainWindow", "splitterSize1", false, 379).toInt());
00368 
00369   splitter->setSizes(a);
00370 
00371   val = CoreLib->getSetting("wine", "WineBin");
00372   DEFAULT_WINE_BIN=val.toString();
00373   val = CoreLib->getSetting("wine", "ServerBin");
00374   DEFAULT_WINE_SERVER=val.toString();
00375   val = CoreLib->getSetting("wine", "LoaderBin");
00376   DEFAULT_WINE_LOADER=val.toString();
00377   val = CoreLib->getSetting("wine", "WineLibs");
00378   DEFAULT_WINE_LIBS=val.toString();
00379 
00380   val = CoreLib->getSetting("app", "showTrareyIcon", false);
00381   SHOW_TRAREY_ICON=val.toBool();
00382 
00383   val = CoreLib->getSetting("system", "tar");
00384   TAR_BIN=val.toString();
00385   val = CoreLib->getSetting("system", "mount");
00386   MOUNT_BIN=val.toString();
00387   val = CoreLib->getSetting("system", "umount");
00388   UMOUNT_BIN=val.toString();
00389   val = CoreLib->getSetting("system", "sudo");
00390   SUDO_BIN=val.toString();
00391   val = CoreLib->getSetting("system", "gui_sudo");
00392   GUI_SUDO_BIN=val.toString();
00393   val = CoreLib->getSetting("system", "nice");
00394   NICE_BIN=val.toString();
00395   val = CoreLib->getSetting("system", "renice");
00396   RENICE_BIN=val.toString();
00397   val = CoreLib->getSetting("system", "sh");
00398   SH_BIN=val.toString();
00399 
00400   val = CoreLib->getSetting("console", "bin");
00401   CONSOLE_BIN=val.toString();
00402   val = CoreLib->getSetting("console", "args", false);
00403   CONSOLE_ARGS=val.toString();
00404 
00405 #ifdef WITH_ICOTOOLS
00406   val = CoreLib->getSetting("icotool", "wrestool");
00407   WRESTOOL_BIN=val.toString();
00408   val = CoreLib->getSetting("icotool", "icotool");
00409   ICOTOOL_BIN=val.toString();
00410 #endif
00411 
00412 
00413 
00414       if (CoreLib->getSetting("advanced", "mount_drive_string", FALSE).toString().isEmpty()){
00415             QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00416             settings.beginGroup("advanced");
00417 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00418             settings.setValue("mount_drive_string", "%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_DRIVE% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00419 #endif
00420 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00421             settings.setValue(("mount_drive_string", "%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% -t cd9660 %MOUNT_DRIVE% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00422 #endif
00423             settings.endGroup();
00424       }
00425 
00426       if (CoreLib->getSetting("advanced", "mount_image_string", FALSE).toString().isEmpty()){
00427             QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00428             settings.beginGroup("advanced");
00429 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00430             settings.setValue("mount_image_string", "%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_OPTIONS% %MOUNT_IMAGE% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00431 #endif
00432 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00433                 settings.setValue("mount_image_string", "%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% -t cd9660 /dev/`%MDCONFIG_BIN% -f %MOUNT_IMAGE%` %MOUNT_POINT%");
00434 #endif
00435             settings.endGroup();
00436       }
00437 
00438       if (CoreLib->getSetting("advanced", "umount_string", FALSE).toString().isEmpty()){
00439             QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00440             settings.beginGroup("advanced");
00441 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00442             settings.setValue("umount_string", "%GUI_SUDO% %UMOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00443 #endif
00444 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00445             settings.setValue("umount_string", "%GUI_SUDO% %UMOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00446 #endif
00447             settings.endGroup();
00448       }
00449 
00450 
00451 /*
00452       if (txtMountImageString->text().isEmpty()){
00453 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00454             txtMountImageString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_OPTIONS% %MOUNT_IMAGE% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00455 #endif
00456 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00457             txtMountString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %MOUNT_BIN% -t cd9660 /dev/`%MDCONFIG_BIN -f %%MOUNT_IMAGE%` %MOUNT_POINT%");
00458 #endif
00459       }
00460 
00461       if (txtUmountString->text().isEmpty())
00462             txtUmountString->setText("%GUI_SUDO% %UMOUNT_BIN% %MOUNT_POINT%");
00463 */
00464 
00465 
00466 
00467 
00468   QString oldDir, oldPrefix;
00469   oldPrefix = CoreLib->getSetting("LastPrefix", "prefix", false).toString();
00470   oldDir = CoreLib->getSetting("LastPrefix", "dir", false).toString();
00471 
00472   if (!oldPrefix.isEmpty()){
00473 
00474       cbPrefixes->setCurrentIndex(cbPrefixes->findText(oldPrefix, Qt::MatchExactly));
00475 
00476       QTreeWidgetItem* item;
00477       QTreeWidgetItem* childItem;
00478       for(int i=0; i < twPrograms->topLevelItemCount(); i++)
00479       {
00480         item = twPrograms->topLevelItem(i);
00481         if (oldPrefix==item->text(0)){
00482             if (oldDir.isEmpty()){
00483               twPrograms->setCurrentItem(item);
00484               twPrograms_ItemClick(item, 0);
00485               break;
00486             } else {
00487               for (int j=0; j < item->childCount(); j++){
00488                   childItem=item->child(j);
00489                   if (childItem->text(0)==oldDir){
00490                     twPrograms->setCurrentItem(childItem);
00491                     twPrograms_ItemClick(childItem, 0);
00492                   }
00493               }
00494             }
00495         }
00496       }
00497   }
00498 
00499   switch (CoreLib->getSetting("network", "type", false).toInt()){
00500             case 0:
00501       proxy.setType(QNetworkProxy::NoProxy);
00502       QNetworkProxy::setApplicationProxy(proxy);
00503       break;
00504             case 1:
00505       proxy.setType(QNetworkProxy::HttpProxy);
00506       proxy.setHostName(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "host", false).toString());
00507       proxy.setPort(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "port", false).toInt());
00508       proxy.setUser(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "user", false).toString());
00509       proxy.setPassword(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "pass", false).toString());
00510       QNetworkProxy::setApplicationProxy(proxy);
00511       break;
00512             case 2:
00513       proxy.setType(QNetworkProxy::Socks5Proxy);
00514       proxy.setHostName(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "host", false).toString());
00515       proxy.setPort(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "port", false).toInt());
00516       proxy.setUser(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "user", false).toString());
00517       proxy.setPassword(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "pass", false).toString());
00518       QNetworkProxy::setApplicationProxy(proxy);
00519       break;
00520   }
00521   return;
00522 }
00523 
00524 void MainWindow::lstIcons_ItemDoubleClick(QListWidgetItem * item){
00525   /*
00526       * This is function for getting icon settings and run associated program
00527       */
00528   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
00529 
00530   if (!twPrograms->currentItem()){
00531       lstIcons->clear();
00532       return;
00533   }
00534 
00535   statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Starting %1 ...").arg(item->text()));
00536   if (treeItem->parent()){
00537       if (CoreLib->runIcon(treeItem->parent()->text(0), treeItem->text(0), item->text())){
00538         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("%1 started.").arg(item->text()));
00539       } else {
00540         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("%1 fail to start.").arg(item->text()));
00541       }
00542   } else {
00543       if (CoreLib->runIcon(treeItem->text(0), "", item->text())){
00544         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("%1 started.").arg(item->text()));
00545       } else {
00546         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("%1 fail to start.").arg(item->text()));
00547       }
00548 
00549   }
00550   return;
00551 }
00552 
00553 void MainWindow::twPrograms_ItemClick(QTreeWidgetItem * item, int){
00554 
00555   /*
00556        * This is check for root element, or not.
00557        * If yes -- show root-level Icons.
00558        * otherwise -- show children-level icons
00559        */
00560 
00561   QListWidgetItem *iconItem;
00562   QList<QStringList> iconsList;
00563 
00564   lstIcons->clear();
00565   lblInfo->setText(tr("Program: <br> Description:"));
00566 
00567   if (!item)
00568       return;
00569 
00570   if (item->parent()){
00571       iconsList=db_icon->getByPrefixAndDirName(item->parent()->text(0), item->text(0));
00572       cbPrefixes->setCurrentIndex(cbPrefixes->findText(item->parent()->text(0), Qt::MatchExactly));
00573   } else {
00574       iconsList=db_icon->getByPrefixAndDirName(item->text(0), "");
00575       cbPrefixes->setCurrentIndex(cbPrefixes->findText(item->text(0), Qt::MatchExactly));
00576   }
00577 
00578 
00579   for (int i = 0; i < iconsList.size(); ++i) {
00580       iconItem = new QListWidgetItem(lstIcons, 0);
00581       iconItem->setText(iconsList.at(i).at(1));
00582 
00583       //Seting icon. If no icon or icon file not exists -- setting default
00584       if (iconsList.at(i).at(3).isEmpty()){
00585         iconItem->setIcon(loadIcon("data/exec_wine.png"));
00586       } else {
00587         if (QFile::exists (iconsList.at(i).at(3))){
00588             iconItem->setIcon(QIcon(iconsList.at(i).at(3)));
00589         } else {
00590             if (iconsList.at(i).at(3)=="wineconsole"){
00591               iconItem->setIcon(loadIcon("data/wineconsole.png"));
00592             } else if (iconsList.at(i).at(3)=="regedit"){
00593               iconItem->setIcon(loadIcon("data/regedit.png"));
00594             } else if (iconsList.at(i).at(3)=="wordpad"){
00595               iconItem->setIcon(loadIcon("data/notepad.png"));
00596             } else if (iconsList.at(i).at(3)=="winecfg"){
00597               iconItem->setIcon(loadIcon("data/winecfg.png"));
00598             } else if (iconsList.at(i).at(3)=="uninstaller"){
00599               iconItem->setIcon(loadIcon("data/uninstaller.png"));
00600             } else if (iconsList.at(i).at(3)=="eject"){
00601               iconItem->setIcon(loadIcon("data/eject.png"));
00602             } else if (iconsList.at(i).at(3)=="explorer"){
00603               iconItem->setIcon(loadIcon("data/explorer.png"));
00604             } else {
00605               iconItem->setIcon(loadIcon("data/exec_wine.png"));
00606             }
00607         }
00608       }
00609   }
00610 
00611   return;
00612 }
00613 
00614 void MainWindow::updateDtabaseConnectedItems(int currentPrefix){
00615   /*
00616             Function for updating objects content to database values
00617       */
00618 
00619   QList<QStringList> result, subresult;
00620 
00621   int curRows = 0, numRows = 0;
00622 
00623   QTableWidgetItem *newItem;
00624   QTreeWidgetItem *prefixItem;
00625   QTreeWidgetItem *subPrefixItem;
00626 
00627   // Clearing widgets
00628   cbPrefixes->clear();
00629   twPrograms->clear();
00630   lstIcons->clear();
00631 
00632   result = db_prefix->getFields();
00633   for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); ++i) {
00634       // Inserting root items into programs tree view
00635       prefixItem = new QTreeWidgetItem(twPrograms);
00636       prefixItem->setText(0, tr("%1").arg(result.at(i).at(1)));
00637       prefixItem->setIcon(0, loadIcon("data/wine.png"));
00638       prefixItem->setExpanded (TRUE);
00639       twPrograms->addTopLevelItem(prefixItem);
00640 
00641       // Inserting subfolders items into programs tree view
00642       subresult = db_dir->getFieldsByPrefixId(result.at(i).at(0));
00643       for (int j = 0; j < subresult.size(); ++j) {
00644         subPrefixItem = new QTreeWidgetItem(prefixItem, 0);
00645         subPrefixItem->setText(0, tr("%1").arg(subresult.at(j).at(1)));
00646         subPrefixItem->setIcon(0, loadIcon("data/folder.png"));
00647       }
00648 
00649       // Inserting items into prefixes combo list
00650       cbPrefixes->addItem (result.at(i).at(1));
00651 
00652       // Inserting items into prefixes table widget
00653       curRows++;
00654       numRows = tablePrefix->rowCount();
00655 
00656       if (curRows>numRows){
00657         tablePrefix->insertRow (numRows);
00658         numRows = tablePrefix->rowCount();
00659       }
00660       if (tablePrefix->item(curRows - 1, 0)){
00661         tablePrefix->item(curRows - 1, 0)->setText(result.at(i).at(1));
00662         tablePrefix->item(curRows - 1, 1)->setText(result.at(i).at(2));
00663       } else {
00664         newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(result.at(i).at(1));
00665         tablePrefix->setItem(curRows - 1, 0, newItem);
00666         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00667         newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(result.at(i).at(2));
00668         tablePrefix->setItem(curRows - 1, 1, newItem);
00669         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00670       }
00671   }
00672 
00673   numRows = tablePrefix->rowCount();
00674   if (numRows > curRows){
00675       for (int i=curRows; i <= numRows; i++)
00676         tablePrefix->removeRow(curRows);
00677   }
00678 
00679   if (currentPrefix > 0)
00680       cbPrefixes->setCurrentIndex (currentPrefix);
00681 
00682   return;
00683 }
00684

00687   return;
00688 }

00753 void MainWindow::twPrograms_ShowContextMenu(const QPoint){
00754   /*
00755             Custom context menu for twPrograms
00756       */
00757 
00758   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
00759 
00760   QString cdrom_drive, cdrom_mount;
00761   QStringList result;
00762   QList<QStringList> images;
00763 
00764   if (!treeItem)
00765       return;
00766 
00767   this->twPrograms_ItemClick(treeItem, 0);
00768 
00769   if (treeItem->parent()){
00770       result = db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(treeItem->parent()->text(0));
00771   } else {
00772       result = db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(treeItem->text(0));
00773   }
00774 
00775   xdgOpenPrefixDir->setEnabled(TRUE);
00776   winefileOpenPrefixDir->setEnabled(TRUE);
00777 
00778   cdrom_drive = result.at(7);
00779   cdrom_mount = result.at(6);
00780 
00781   if (cdrom_mount.isEmpty()){
00782       xdgOpenMountDir->setEnabled(FALSE);
00783       winefileOpenMountDir->setEnabled(FALSE);
00784   } else {
00785       xdgOpenMountDir->setEnabled(TRUE);
00786       winefileOpenMountDir->setEnabled(TRUE);
00787   }
00788 
00789   QMenu* menuDirMountImages;
00790   menuDirMountImages = new QMenu(this);
00791 
00792   if (!treeItem->parent()){
00793       dirRename->setEnabled(FALSE);
00794       dirDelete->setEnabled(FALSE);
00795   } else {
00796       dirRename->setEnabled(TRUE);
00797       dirDelete->setEnabled(TRUE);
00798   }
00799 
00800   menuDirMount->clear();
00801   menuDirMount->setEnabled(FALSE);
00802 
00803   if (!cdrom_drive.isEmpty() && !cdrom_mount.isEmpty()){
00804       menuDirMount->setEnabled(TRUE);
00805       menuDirMountImages = menuDirMount->addMenu(tr("mount [%1]").arg(CoreLib->getMountedImages(cdrom_mount)));
00806       if (!cdrom_drive.isEmpty()){
00807         menuDirMountImages->addAction(QIcon(":/data/drive_menu.png"), cdrom_drive);
00808         menuDirMountImages->addSeparator();
00809       }
00810 
00811       images = db_image->getFields();
00812       for (int i = 0; i < images.size(); ++i) {
00813         menuDirMountImages->addAction(QIcon(":/data/cdrom_menu.png") , images.at(i).at(0));
00814       }
00815 
00816       menuDirMount->addAction(dirUnmount);
00817       menuDirMount->addAction(dirMountOther);
00818 
00819       connect (menuDirMountImages, SIGNAL(triggered(QAction*)), this, SLOT(menuMountImages_triggered(QAction*)));
00820   }
00821   if (!cdrom_mount.isEmpty()){
00822       dirUnmount->setEnabled(TRUE);
00823       dirMountOther->setEnabled(TRUE);
00824       dirUnmount->setText(tr("umount [%1]").arg(cdrom_mount));
00825   } else {
00826       dirUnmount->setEnabled(FALSE);
00827       dirMountOther->setEnabled(FALSE);
00828       dirUnmount->setText(tr("umount [none]"));
00829   }
00830 
00831   menuDir->exec(QCursor::pos());
00832   return;
00833 }
00834 
00835 void MainWindow::menuMountImages_triggered ( QAction * action ){
00836   /*
00837        * This slot process menuDirMountImages and menuIconMountImages triggered signal
00838        */
00839   bool ret;
00840   if (twPrograms->currentItem()){
00841       if (twPrograms->currentItem()->parent()){
00842         ret=CoreLib->mountImage(action->text(), twPrograms->currentItem()->parent()->text(0));
00843       } else {
00844         ret=CoreLib->mountImage(action->text(), twPrograms->currentItem()->text(0));
00845       }
00846   }
00847 
00848   if (ret){
00849       statusBar()->showMessage(QObject::tr("%1 successfully mounted.").arg(action->text()));
00850   } else {
00851       statusBar()->showMessage(QObject::tr("Fail to mount %1.").arg(action->text()));
00852   }
00853   return;
00854 }

00856 void MainWindow::lstIcons_ShowContextMenu(const QPoint & iPoint){
00857   /*
00858             Function showing context menu
00859       */
00860 
00861   QListWidgetItem *iconItem = lstIcons->itemAt(iPoint);
00862   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
00863 
00864   if (iconItem)
00865       this->lstIcons_ItemClick(iconItem);
00866 
00867   QString cdrom_drive, cdrom_mount;
00868   QStringList result;
00869   QList<QStringList> images;
00870 
00871   if (!treeItem)
00872       return;
00873 
00874   if (treeItem->parent()){
00875       result = db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(treeItem->parent()->text(0));
00876   } else {
00877       result = db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(treeItem->text(0));
00878   }
00879 
00880   if (result.at(2).isEmpty()){
00881       xdgOpenPrefixDir->setEnabled(FALSE);
00882       winefileOpenPrefixDir->setEnabled(FALSE);
00883   } else {
00884       xdgOpenPrefixDir->setEnabled(TRUE);
00885       winefileOpenPrefixDir->setEnabled(TRUE);
00886   }
00887 
00888   cdrom_drive = result.at(7);
00889   cdrom_mount = result.at(6);
00890 
00891   if (cdrom_mount.isEmpty()){
00892       xdgOpenMountDir->setEnabled(FALSE);
00893       winefileOpenMountDir->setEnabled(FALSE);
00894   } else {
00895       xdgOpenMountDir->setEnabled(TRUE);
00896       winefileOpenMountDir->setEnabled(TRUE);
00897   }
00898 
00899   menuIconMount->clear();
00900   menuIconMount->setEnabled(FALSE);
00901 
00902   if (!cdrom_drive.isEmpty() && !cdrom_mount.isEmpty()){
00903       menuIconMount->setEnabled(TRUE);
00904       QMenu* menuIconMountImages;
00905       menuIconMountImages = new QMenu(this);
00906       menuIconMountImages = menuIconMount->addMenu(tr("mount [%1]").arg(CoreLib->getMountedImages(cdrom_mount)));
00907 
00908       if (!cdrom_drive.isEmpty()){
00909         menuIconMountImages->addAction(QIcon(":/data/drive_menu.png"), cdrom_drive);
00910         menuIconMountImages->addSeparator();
00911       }
00912 
00913       menuIconMount->addAction(iconUnmount);
00914       menuIconMount->addAction(iconMountOther);
00915 
00916       images = db_image->getFields();
00917       for (int i = 0; i < images.size(); ++i) {
00918         menuIconMountImages->addAction(QIcon(":/data/cdrom_menu.png") , images.at(i).at(0));
00919       }
00920       connect (menuIconMountImages, SIGNAL(triggered(QAction*)), this, SLOT(menuMountImages_triggered(QAction*)));
00921 
00922       if ((!cdrom_drive.isEmpty()) && (!cdrom_mount.isEmpty())){
00923         iconMount->setEnabled(TRUE);
00924         iconUnmount->setEnabled(TRUE);
00925         iconMount->setText(tr("mount [%1]").arg(cdrom_drive.split("/").last()));
00926         iconUnmount->setText(tr("umount [%1]").arg(cdrom_mount));
00927       } else {
00928         iconMount->setEnabled(FALSE);
00929         iconUnmount->setEnabled(FALSE);
00930         iconMount->setText(tr("mount [none]"));
00931         iconUnmount->setText(tr("umount [none]"));
00932       }
00933 
00934       if (!cdrom_drive.isEmpty()){
00935         iconMountOther->setEnabled(TRUE);
00936       } else {
00937         iconMountOther->setEnabled(FALSE);
00938       }
00939   }
00940 
00941   if (iconBuffer.names.count()>0){
00942       iconPaste->setEnabled(TRUE);
00943   } else {
00944       iconPaste->setEnabled(FALSE);
00945   }
00946 
00947   if (lstIcons->selectedItems().count()>0){
00948       iconDelete->setEnabled(TRUE);
00949       iconCut->setEnabled(TRUE);
00950       iconCopy->setEnabled(TRUE);
00951   } else {
00952       iconDelete->setEnabled(FALSE);
00953       iconCut->setEnabled(FALSE);
00954       iconCopy->setEnabled(FALSE);
00955   }
00956 
00957 
00958 
00959   if(iconItem){
00960       iconRun->setEnabled(TRUE);
00961       iconOptions->setEnabled(TRUE);
00962       iconRename->setEnabled(TRUE);
00963       iconDelete->setEnabled(TRUE);
00964 
00965       if (treeItem->parent()){
00966         result=db_icon->getByName(treeItem->parent()->text(0), treeItem->text(0), iconItem->text());
00967       } else {
00968         result=db_icon->getByName(treeItem->text(0), "", iconItem->text());
00969       }
00970 
00971       if (!result.at(4).isEmpty()){
00972         xdgOpenIconDir->setEnabled(TRUE);
00973         winefileOpenIconDir->setEnabled(TRUE);
00974       } else {
00975         xdgOpenIconDir->setEnabled(FALSE);
00976         winefileOpenIconDir->setEnabled(FALSE);
00977       }
00978 
00979       menuIcon->exec(QCursor::pos());
00980   } else {
00981       xdgOpenIconDir->setEnabled(FALSE);
00982       winefileOpenIconDir->setEnabled(FALSE);
00983       menuIconVoid->exec(QCursor::pos());
00984   }
00985   return;
00986 }

01021 
01022 void MainWindow::closeEvent(QCloseEvent *event){
01023   if (trayIcon->isVisible()) {
01024       hide();
01025       event->ignore();
01026   }
01027 
01028   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
01029 
01030   QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
01031   settings.beginGroup("MainWindow");
01032   settings.setValue("size", size());
01033   settings.setValue("pos", pos());
01034   settings.setValue("splitterSize0", splitter->sizes().at(0));
01035   settings.setValue("splitterSize1", splitter->sizes().at(1));
01036   settings.endGroup();
01037   settings.beginGroup("LastPrefix");
01038   if (treeItem){
01039       if (treeItem->parent()){
01040         settings.setValue("prefix", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
01041         settings.setValue("dir", treeItem->text(0));
01042       } else {
01043         settings.setValue("prefix", treeItem->text(0));
01044         settings.setValue("dir", "");
01045       }
01046   } else {
01047       settings.setValue("prefix", "");
01048       settings.setValue("dir", "");
01049   }
01050   settings.endGroup();
01051 
01052   return;
01053 }
01054 
01055 
01056 bool MainWindow::eventFilter(QObject *obj, QEvent *event){
01057 
01058   // twPrograms events
01059 
01060   if (obj == twPrograms) {
01061       QKeyEvent *keyEvent = static_cast<QKeyEvent*>(event);
01062       if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyRelease) {
01063 
01064 
01065         if ((keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Up) or (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Down)){
01066             if (twPrograms->currentItem())
01067               twPrograms_ItemClick(twPrograms->currentItem(), 0);
01068             return true;
01069         }
01070 
01071 
01072       }
01073 
01074       if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress){
01075         if ((keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Tab)){
01076             lstIcons->setFocus();
01077             if (lstIcons->currentItem())
01078               lstIcons_ItemClick(lstIcons->currentItem());
01079             return true;
01080         }
01081 
01082         if (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Delete){
01083             if (twPrograms->currentItem())
01084               dirDelete_Click();
01085             return true;
01086         }
01087       }
01088 
01089       return false;
01090 
01091   }
01092 
01093   // lstIcons events
01094 
01095   if (obj == lstIcons){
01096       QKeyEvent *keyEvent = static_cast<QKeyEvent*>(event);
01097 
01098       if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyRelease) {
01099 
01100 
01101         if ((keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Up) or (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Down) or (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Left) or (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Right)){
01102             if (lstIcons->currentItem())
01103               lstIcons_ItemClick(lstIcons->currentItem());
01104             return true;
01105         }
01106       }
01107 
01108       if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress){
01109         if ((keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Tab)){
01110             twPrograms->setFocus();
01111             return true;
01112         }
01113 
01114         if (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Return){
01115             if (lstIcons->currentItem())
01116               lstIcons_ItemDoubleClick(lstIcons->currentItem());
01117             return true;
01118         }
01119 
01120         if (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Delete){
01121             if (lstIcons->currentItem())
01122               iconDelete_Click();
01123             return true;
01124         }
01125       }
01126 
01127       return false;
01128   }
01129 
01130   return QMainWindow::eventFilter(obj, event);
01131 }
01132 
01133 
01134 void MainWindow::resizeEvent (QResizeEvent){
01135   /*
01136             Function for hendle resize event: tableProc ( )
01137       */
01138 
01139   CoreFunction_ResizeContent(1);
01140   CoreFunction_ResizeContent(3);
01141 
01142   return;
01143 }
01144 
01145 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_ResizeContent(int tabIndex){
01146   /*
01147             Function for hendle resize event
01148 
01149             @screen -- tab id
01150       */
01151 
01152   switch (tabIndex){
01153             case 1:
01154       //Initiate /proc reading
01155       if (_IS_TIMER_RUNNING){
01156         getWineProccessInfo();
01157         // Starting timer for reading /proc
01158         timer->start(1000);
01159       }
01160 
01161       tableProc->resizeRowsToContents();
01162       tableProc->resizeColumnsToContents();
01163       tableProc->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
01164       break;
01165             case 3:
01166 
01167       tablePrefix->resizeRowsToContents();
01168       tablePrefix->resizeColumnsToContents();
01169       tablePrefix->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
01170 
01171       // Stopping timer for reading /proc
01172       if (_IS_TIMER_RUNNING)
01173         timer->stop();
01174       break;
01175             default:
01176       // Stopping timer for reading /proc
01177       if (_IS_TIMER_RUNNING)
01178         timer->stop();
01179       break;
01180   }
01181 
01182   return;
01183 }
01184 
01185 void MainWindow::processRenice_Click(void){
01186   /*
01187        *    Getting nice level from user
01188        */
01189 
01190   bool ok;
01191 
01192   int rowNum;
01193   rowNum = tableProc->currentRow();
01194 
01195   if (rowNum>=0){
01196       int curNice;
01197       curNice = tableProc->item(rowNum, 2)->text().toInt();
01198 
01199       int i = QInputDialog::getInteger(this, tr("Select process priority"), tr("<p>Priority value can be in<br>the range from PRIO_MIN (-20)<br>to PRIO_MAX (20).</p><p>See \"man renice\" for details.</p>"), curNice, -20, 20, 1, &ok);
01200 
01201       if (ok)
01202         CoreFunction_SetProcNicePriority(i, tableProc->item(rowNum, 0)->text().toInt());
01203   }
01204 }
01205 
01206 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_SetProcNicePriority(int priority, int pid){
01207   /*
01208        * Core function for executing renice command
01209        */
01210 
01211   QStringList args;
01212   QString arg;
01213   args << RENICE_BIN;
01214   args.append(tr("%1").arg(priority));
01215   args.append(tr("%1").arg(pid));
01216 
01217   //Fix args for kdesu\gksu\e.t.c.
01218   if (!GUI_SUDO_BIN.contains(QRegExp("/sudo$"))){
01219       arg=args.join(" ");
01220       args.clear();
01221       args<<arg;
01222   }
01223 
01224   Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, GUI_SUDO_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("reniceing..."), tr("reniceing..."));
01225   if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
01226       getWineProccessInfo();
01227   } else {
01228       statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Renice fail fail"));
01229   }
01230 
01231   return;
01232 }
01233 
01234 void MainWindow::getWineProccessInfo(void){
01235   // If _RUN_TIMER==FALSE then timer is stopped by user
01236   if (!_IS_TIMER_RUNNING)
01237       return;
01238 
01239   QList<QStringList> proclist;
01240   int numRows = tableProc->rowCount();
01241   int curRows = 0;
01242 
01243   // Getting QList of QStringList which describes running wine processes
01244   proclist = CoreLib->getWineProcessList();
01245 
01246   // Preccess QList items one by one
01247   for (int i = 0; i < proclist.size(); ++i) {
01248       //If first element value "-1" -- then disable timer and set _IS_TIMER_RUNNING flag
01249       if (proclist.at(i).at(0) == "-1"){
01250         _IS_TIMER_RUNNING=false;
01251         timer->stop();
01252         return;
01253       }
01254 
01255       curRows++;
01256 
01257       if (curRows>numRows){
01258         tableProc->insertRow (numRows);
01259         numRows = tableProc->rowCount();
01260       }
01261 
01262       if (tableProc->item(curRows - 1, 0)){
01263         tableProc->item(curRows - 1, 0)->setText(proclist.at(i).at(0));
01264         tableProc->item(curRows - 1, 1)->setText(proclist.at(i).at(1));
01265         tableProc->item(curRows - 1, 2)->setText(proclist.at(i).at(2));
01266         tableProc->item(curRows - 1, 3)->setText(proclist.at(i).at(3));
01267       } else {
01268         QTableWidgetItem *newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(proclist.at(i).at(0));
01269         tableProc->setItem(curRows - 1, 0, newItem);
01270         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
01271         newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(proclist.at(i).at(1));
01272         tableProc->setItem(curRows - 1, 1, newItem);
01273         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
01274         newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(proclist.at(i).at(2));
01275         tableProc->setItem(curRows - 1, 2, newItem);
01276         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
01277         newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(proclist.at(i).at(3));
01278         tableProc->setItem(curRows - 1, 3, newItem);
01279         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
01280       }
01281 
01282   }
01283 
01284 
01285   if (tableProc->currentItem ()){
01286       processKillSelected->setEnabled(TRUE);
01287       processKillWine->setEnabled(TRUE);
01288       processRenice->setEnabled(TRUE);
01289   } else {
01290       processKillSelected->setEnabled(FALSE);
01291       processKillWine->setEnabled(FALSE);
01292       processRenice->setEnabled(FALSE);
01293   }
01294 
01295 
01296   // Remove unneaded entyes
01297   numRows = tableProc->rowCount();
01298   if (numRows > curRows)
01299       for (int i=curRows; i <= numRows; i++)
01300         tableProc->removeRow(curRows);
01301 
01302 
01303   lblProcInfo->setText(tr("Total process: %1").arg(numRows));
01304 
01305   return;
01306 }
01307 
01308 void MainWindow::cmdCreateFake_Click(){
01309 
01310   QString prefixPath = db_prefix->getPath(cbPrefixes->currentText());
01311   QString sysregPath;
01312   sysregPath.append(prefixPath);
01313   sysregPath.append("/system.reg");
01314 
01315   QFile sysreg_file (sysregPath);
01316 
01317   if (sysreg_file.exists()){
01318       if (QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("There are other Fake drive installed in %1 prefix directory.<br><br>Do you wish to REMOVE ALL FILES from prefix folder?").arg(prefixPath), QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No)==QMessageBox::Yes){
01319 
01320         QStringList args;
01321         args << "-rdf";
01322         args << prefixPath;
01323 
01324         Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, "/bin/rm", HOME_PATH, tr("Removing old fake drive.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Removing old fake drive"));
01325 
01326         if (exportProcess->exec()!=QDialog::Accepted){
01327             return;
01328         }
01329       } else {
01330         return;
01331       }
01332   }
01333 
01334   QDir fakeDir (prefixPath);
01335   if (!fakeDir.exists())
01336       fakeDir.mkdir(prefixPath);
01337 
01338   Wizard *createFakeDriveWizard = new Wizard(2, cbPrefixes->currentText());
01339   if (createFakeDriveWizard->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
01340       updateDtabaseConnectedItems(cbPrefixes->currentIndex());
01341   }
01342 
01343   return;
01344 }

01355 void MainWindow::processKillWine_Click(){
01356   // Function for killling wineserver for current prefix
01357   int rowNum;
01358   rowNum = tableProc->currentRow();
01359 
01360   if (rowNum>=0){
01361       QString prefixPath;
01362       prefixPath = tableProc->item(rowNum, 3)->text();
01363 
01364       if (QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("This action will send a TREM(-9) signal to all wine proccess with WINEPREFIX='%1'<br><br>Do you really want to proceed?").arg(tableProc->item(rowNum, 3)->text()), QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No)==QMessageBox::Yes){
01365         CoreLib->killWineServer(prefixPath);
01366       }
01367   }
01368   return;
01369 }
01370 
01371 void MainWindow::processKillSelected_Click(){
01372   int rowNum;
01373   rowNum = tableProc->currentRow();
01374 
01375   if (rowNum>=0){
01376       QString procId;
01377       procId = tableProc->item(rowNum, 0)->text();
01378 
01379       if (QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("This action will send a TREM(-9) signal to proccess '%2' pid: %1<br><br>It is HIGH risk to damage wine normal state.<br><br>Do you really want to proceed?").arg(tableProc->item(rowNum, 0)->text()) .arg(tableProc->item(rowNum, 1)->text()),                   QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No)==QMessageBox::Yes){
01380 
01381         QString command;
01382         command="kill -9 ";
01383         command.append(procId);
01384         if (system(command.toAscii().data())==-1)
01385             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Can't run: %1").arg(command.toAscii().data()), QMessageBox::Ok);
01386       }
01387   }
01388   return;
01389 }

01407 void MainWindow::prefixDelete_Click(){
01408 
01409   if (tablePrefix->currentRow()>=0){
01410       if (tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text()=="Default"){
01411         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"),
01412                                        tr("Sorry, you can't delete Default prefix."), QMessageBox::Ok);
01413         return;
01414       }
01415 
01416       if(QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
01417                                           tr("Do you really wish to delete prefix named \"%1\" and all associated icons?").arg(tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text()), QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Cancel)==QMessageBox::Ok){
01418         if (db_icon->delIconsByPrefixName(tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text()))
01419             if(db_dir->delDir(tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text()))
01420               db_prefix->delByName(tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text());
01421       }
01422   }
01423 
01424   updateDtabaseConnectedItems();
01425   return;
01426 }

01428 void MainWindow::prefixImport_Click(){
01429   /*
01430             Function for importing preefix from file
01431       */
01432 
01433   QString openpath;
01434 
01435   //Getting user selected path for prefix store, if not -- use default
01436   if (!PREFIX_EI_PATH.isEmpty()){
01437       openpath.append(PREFIX_EI_PATH);
01438   } else {
01439       openpath.append(QDir::homePath());
01440       openpath.append("/.config/");
01441       openpath.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
01442       openpath.append("/prefixes/");
01443   }
01444 
01445   QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Select file to import"), openpath , tr("Images (*.tbz)"));
01446 
01447   if (!fileName.isEmpty()){
01448       QDir dir;
01449       QString targetDir;
01450 
01451       if (tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 1)->text().isEmpty()){
01452         targetDir.clear();
01453         targetDir.append(HOME_PATH);
01454         targetDir.append("/.wine/");
01455       } else {
01456         targetDir.clear();
01457         targetDir.append(tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 1)->text());
01458       }
01459 
01460       if (dir.exists(targetDir)){
01461         if(QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("Do you really wish to delete all old prefix files?"), QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Cancel)==QMessageBox::Ok){
01462             QStringList args;
01463             args << "-rdf";
01464             args << targetDir;
01465 
01466             Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, CoreLib->getWhichOut("rm"), HOME_PATH, tr("Removing old fake drive.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Removing old fake drive"));
01467             if (exportProcess->exec()!=QDialog::Accepted){
01468               return;
01469             }
01470         } else {
01471             return;
01472         }
01473       }
01474 
01475       dir.mkdir(targetDir);
01476       QStringList args;
01477       args << "-xjf";
01478       args << fileName;
01479       args << "-C" << targetDir;
01480 
01481       //Creating process dialog
01482       Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, TAR_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Importing prefix.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Importing prefix"));
01483       exportProcess->show();
01484   }
01485   return;
01486 }

01499 void MainWindow::prefixExport_Click(){
01500   /*
01501        * Function for exporting preefix to file
01502        */
01503 
01504   QString savepath;
01505 
01506   //Getting user selected path for prefix store, if not -- use default
01507   if (!PREFIX_EI_PATH.isEmpty()){
01508       savepath.append(PREFIX_EI_PATH);
01509   } else {
01510       savepath.append(QDir::homePath());
01511       savepath.append("/.config/");
01512       savepath.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
01513       savepath.append("/prefixes/");
01514   }
01515 
01516   //Creating save path
01517   savepath.append(tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text());
01518   savepath.append("-");
01519   savepath.append(QDate::currentDate().toString(Qt::ISODate));
01520   savepath.append(".tbz");
01521 
01522   //Request user for valid save path
01523   QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, tr("Select file to export"), savepath , tr("Images (*.tbz)"));
01524 
01525   if (!fileName.isEmpty()){
01526       QStringList args;
01527 
01528       args << "-cjf";
01529       args << fileName;
01530 
01531 
01532       QString prefix_path = tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 1)->text();
01533 
01534       if (prefix_path.isEmpty()){
01535         prefix_path.clear();
01536         prefix_path.append(HOME_PATH);
01537         prefix_path.append("/.wine/");
01538       }
01539 
01540       args << "-C";
01541       args << prefix_path;
01542       args << "./";
01543 
01544       //Creating process dialog
01545       Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, TAR_BIN, prefix_path, tr("Exporting %1 prefix.<br>This can take a while...").arg(tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text()), tr("Exporting prefix"));
01546 
01547       exportProcess->show();
01548   }
01549 
01550   return;
01551 }

01680

01735 
01736 void MainWindow::mainExportIcons_Click(){
01737   /*
01738        * main Menu allow export icons
01739        */
01740 
01741   if (!isVisible())
01742       setMeVisible(TRUE);
01743 
01744   QString fileName, tmpDir;
01745   QStringList args;
01746 
01747   fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open image file"), QDir::homePath(), tr("Win32 Executable and Shared libraies (*.exe *.dll);;Win32 Executable (*.exe);;Win32 Shared libraies (*.dll)") );
01748 
01749   if(fileName.isEmpty())
01750       return;
01751 
01752   args << "-x";
01753   args << "-t" << "14";
01754 
01755   QStringList list1 = fileName.split("/");
01756 
01757   tmpDir.clear();
01758 
01759   tmpDir.append(QDir::homePath());
01760   tmpDir.append("/.config/");
01761   tmpDir.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
01762   tmpDir.append("/tmp/");
01763   tmpDir.append(list1.last());
01764 
01765   QDir tmp(tmpDir);
01766   tmp.setFilter(QDir::Files | QDir::Hidden | QDir::NoSymLinks);
01767   QFileInfoList list = tmp.entryInfoList();
01768 
01769   if (tmp.exists(tmpDir)){
01770       for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
01771         QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
01772         if (!tmp.remove(fileInfo.filePath()))
01773             qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete files at: "<<fileInfo.filePath();
01774       }
01775 
01776   } else {
01777       if (!tmp.mkdir(tmpDir)){
01778         qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't create temp directory at: "<<tmpDir;
01779       }
01780   }
01781 
01782 
01783   args << "-o" << tmpDir;
01784   args << fileName;
01785 
01786   Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, WRESTOOL_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Exporting icon from binary file.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Exporting icon"));
01787 
01788   if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
01789       //icotool -x -o ./regedit.png --width=32 --height=32 ./regedit.exe_14_100_0.ico
01790 
01791 
01792 
01793       args.clear();
01794       args << "-x";
01795       args << "-o" << tr("%1/").arg(tmpDir);
01796 
01797       // Updating file index
01798       list = tmp.entryInfoList();
01799 
01800       //Creating file list for converting
01801       for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
01802         QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
01803         if (fileInfo.fileName().right(3)=="ico")
01804             args << fileInfo.filePath();
01805       }
01806 
01807 
01808       //Look here, this function checks is some icons found, or not. 5 -- is default number of arguments,
01809       //if more -- then we have some ico file to convert
01810       if (args.size()>=4){
01811 
01812         exportProcess = new Process(args, ICOTOOL_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Convering icon from binary file.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Converting icon"));
01813 
01814         if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
01815             IconsView *iconsView = new IconsView(tmpDir);
01816             iconsView->exec();
01817         }
01818 
01819       } else {
01820         IconsView *iconsView = new IconsView(tmpDir);
01821         iconsView->exec();
01822       }
01823   }
01824 
01825   //Clearing temp files
01826   list = tmp.entryInfoList();
01827 
01828   //Creating file list for converting
01829   for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
01830       QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
01831       if (!QFile::remove(fileInfo.filePath()))
01832         qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete files at: "<<fileInfo.filePath();
01833   }
01834 
01835   if (!tmp.rmdir(tmpDir))
01836       qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete tmp dir: "<<tmpDir;
01837 
01838   return;
01839 }

01841 void MainWindow::createMenuActions(){
01842   /*
01843        * Context menu for process manage
01844        */
01845 
01846   processKillSelected = new QAction(loadIcon("data/kill.png"), tr("Stop current"), tableProc);
01847   processKillSelected->setStatusTip(tr("Send TERM signal to selected process"));
01848   connect(processKillSelected, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(processKillSelected_Click()));
01849 
01850   processKillWine = new QAction(loadIcon("data/stop.png"), tr("Stop wine"), tableProc);
01851   processKillWine->setStatusTip(tr("Send TERM signal to main wine process"));
01852   connect(processKillWine, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(processKillWine_Click()));
01853 
01854   processRefresh = new QAction(loadIcon("data/reload.png"), tr("Refresh list"), tableProc);
01855   processRefresh->setStatusTip(tr("Refresh process list"));
01856   connect(processRefresh, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(getWineProccessInfo()));
01857 
01858   processRenice = new QAction(tr("Renice"), tableProc);
01859   processRenice->setStatusTip(tr("Set process priority"));
01860   connect(processRenice, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(processRenice_Click()));
01861 
01862   /*
01863        * Context menu for directory manage
01864        */
01865 
01866   dirRun = new QAction(tr("Run..."), twPrograms);
01867   dirRun->setStatusTip(tr("Run application at current prefix"));
01868   connect(dirRun, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(mainRun_Click()));
01869 
01870   dirAdd = new QAction(tr("New"), twPrograms);
01871   dirAdd->setStatusTip(tr("Create new directory"));
01872   connect(dirAdd, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(dirAdd_Click()));
01873 
01874   dirRename = new QAction(tr("Rename"), twPrograms);
01875   dirRename->setStatusTip(tr("Rename current directory"));
01876   connect(dirRename, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(dirRename_Click()));
01877 
01878   dirDelete = new QAction(tr("Delete"), twPrograms);
01879   dirDelete->setStatusTip(tr("Delete current directory"));
01880   connect(dirDelete, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(dirDelete_Click()));
01881 
01882   dirUnmount = new QAction(tr("Unmount cd drive"), twPrograms);
01883   dirUnmount->setStatusTip(tr("Unmounts cdrom drive"));
01884   connect(dirUnmount, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(dirUnmount_Click()));
01885 
01886   dirMountOther = new QAction(tr("mount ..."), lstIcons);
01887   dirMountOther->setStatusTip(tr("Browse for other image"));
01888   connect(dirMountOther, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(dirMountOther_Click()));
01889 
01890   dirConfigure = new QAction(tr("Configure wine"), twPrograms);
01891   dirConfigure->setStatusTip(tr("Configure Wine general settings"));
01892   connect(dirConfigure, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(dirConfigure_Click()));
01893 
01894   dirInstall = new QAction(tr("App install"), twPrograms);
01895   dirInstall->setStatusTip(tr("Runs application install wizard for current prefix"));
01896   connect(dirInstall, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(dirInstall_Click()));

02099 
02100 QIcon MainWindow::loadIcon(QString iconName){
02101   // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
02102   // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
02103 
02104   QIcon icon;
02105 
02106   if ((!THEME_NAME.isEmpty()) and (THEME_NAME!="Default")){
02107       icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(THEME_NAME).arg(iconName));
02108       if (icon.isNull()){
02109         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
02110       }
02111   } else {
02112       icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
02113   }
02114 
02115   return icon;
02116 }

02119   // Toolbar creation function

02124   procToolBar->addAction(processRefresh);
02125 
02126   prefixToolBar = new QToolBar(tlbPrefix);
02127   prefixToolBar->addAction(prefixAdd);
02128   prefixToolBar->addSeparator ();
02129   prefixToolBar->addAction(prefixImport);
02130   prefixToolBar->addAction(prefixExport);
02131   prefixToolBar->addSeparator ();
02132   prefixToolBar->addAction(prefixSettings);
02133   prefixToolBar->addSeparator ();
02134   prefixToolBar->addAction(prefixDelete);
02135 
02136   return;
02137 }

02144 
02145 void MainWindow::iconDelete_Click(void){
02146   /*
02147             This function delete add selected icons
02148       */
02149 
02150   QList<QListWidgetItem *> icoList = lstIcons->selectedItems();
02151   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02152 
02153   if (!treeItem)
02154       return;
02155   if (icoList.count()<0)
02156       return;
02157 
02158   if (QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Delete Icon"), tr("Do you want to delete all selected icons?"),  QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No )==QMessageBox::Yes){
02159       for (int i=0; i<icoList.count(); i++){
02160         if(!treeItem->parent()){
02161             db_icon->delIcon(treeItem->text(0), icoList.at(i)->text());
02162         }else{
02163             db_icon->delIcon(treeItem->parent()->text(0), treeItem->text(0), icoList.at(i)->text());
02164         }
02165       }
02166       twPrograms_ItemClick(treeItem, 0);
02167   }
02168   return;
02169 }
02170 
02171 void MainWindow::iconRun_Click(void){
02172 
02173   QListWidgetItem *iconItem;
02174   iconItem=lstIcons->currentItem();
02175   if (iconItem)
02176       lstIcons_ItemDoubleClick(iconItem);
02177   return;
02178 }
02179 
02180 void MainWindow::iconRename_Click(void){
02181   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem=twPrograms->currentItem();
02182   QListWidgetItem *iconItem=lstIcons->currentItem();
02183   QString prefix_name, dir_name;
02184   bool ok;
02185 
02186   if (!treeItem)
02187       return;
02188   if (!iconItem)
02189       return;
02190 
02191   if (!treeItem->parent()){
02192       prefix_name = treeItem->text(0);
02193       dir_name = "";
02194   } else {
02195       prefix_name = treeItem->parent()->text(0);
02196       dir_name = treeItem->text(0);
02197   }
02198 
02199   QString newName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Enter new icon name"), tr("Icon name:"), QLineEdit::Normal, iconItem->text(), &ok);
02200 
02201   if (ok && !newName.isEmpty()){
02202       while (db_icon->isExistsByName(prefix_name, dir_name, newName)){
02203         newName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Sorry. It seems file already exists."), tr("Sorry. It seems file already exists.<br>Please rename it, or cancel paste operation."), QLineEdit::Normal, newName, &ok);
02204         if ((!ok) || (newName.isEmpty())){
02205             return;
02206         }
02207       }
02208       db_icon->renameIcon(iconItem->text(), prefix_name, dir_name, newName);
02209   }
02210 
02211   twPrograms_ItemClick(treeItem, 0);
02212   return;
02213 }
02214 
02215 void MainWindow::iconAdd_Click(void){
02216   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
02217   IconSettings *iconAddWizard;
02218   treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02219 
02220   if (!treeItem)
02221       return;
02222 
02223   if (treeItem->parent()){
02224       iconAddWizard = new IconSettings(treeItem->parent()->text(0), treeItem->text(0));
02225   } else {
02226       iconAddWizard = new IconSettings(treeItem->text(0), "");
02227   }
02228 
02229   if (iconAddWizard->exec() == QDialog::Accepted){
02230       // Updating icons view
02231       twPrograms_ItemClick(treeItem, 0);
02232   }
02233 
02234   return;
02235 }

02255 
02256 void MainWindow::iconCut_Click(void){
02257   /*
02258             This function fill iconBuffer with selected icons names
02259             and sets other informations required for copy\cut
02260 
02261             see struct iconCopyBuffer definition for details
02262       */
02263   if (!twPrograms->currentItem())
02264       return;
02265 
02266   QList<QListWidgetItem *> icoList = lstIcons->selectedItems();
02267   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02268 
02269   // If icon cutted -- set icon disabled style
02270   // FIXME: It pice works fine, but we nead to usse pixmaps for grayscale, not Qt::ItemIsEnabled flag....
02271   // FIXME: It is optional, i don't work on it until release... ;)
02272   //icoList2 = lstIcons->findItems("*", Qt::MatchWrap | Qt::MatchWildcard);
02273 
02274   //    for (int i=0; i<icoList2.count(); i++){
02275   //        icoList2.at(i)->icon()->addPixmap(QPixmap.alphaChannel (), 0, 0);
02276   //    }
02277 
02278 
02279   // Clearing icon buffer
02280   iconBuffer.names.clear();
02281   iconBuffer.dir_name="";
02282   iconBuffer.prefix_name="";
02283   iconBuffer.move=true;
02284 
02285   // Fiffing buffer with new items
02286   for (int i=0; i<icoList.count(); i++){
02287       iconBuffer.names.append(icoList.at(i)->text());
02288       //icoList.at(i)->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsEnabled);
02289   }
02290 
02291   if (treeItem->parent()){
02292       iconBuffer.prefix_name = treeItem->parent()->text(0);
02293       iconBuffer.dir_name = treeItem->text(0);
02294   } else {
02295       iconBuffer.prefix_name = treeItem->text(0);
02296       iconBuffer.dir_name = "";
02297   }
02298 
02299   return;
02300 }
02301 
02302 void MainWindow::iconCopy_Click(void){
02303   /*
02304       This function fill iconBuffer with selected icons names
02305       and sets other informations required for copy\cut
02306 
02307       see struct iconCopyBuffer definition for details
02308       */
02309 
02310   if (!twPrograms->currentItem())
02311       return;
02312 
02313   QList<QListWidgetItem *> icoList = lstIcons->selectedItems();
02314   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02315 
02316   // Clearing icon buffer
02317   iconBuffer.names.clear();
02318   iconBuffer.dir_name="";
02319   iconBuffer.prefix_name="";
02320   iconBuffer.move=false;
02321 
02322   // Fiffing buffer with new items
02323   for (int i=0; i<icoList.count(); i++){
02324       iconBuffer.names.append(icoList.at(i)->text());
02325   }
02326   if (treeItem->parent()){
02327       iconBuffer.prefix_name = treeItem->parent()->text(0);
02328       iconBuffer.dir_name = treeItem->text(0);
02329   } else {
02330       iconBuffer.prefix_name = treeItem->text(0);
02331       iconBuffer.dir_name = "";
02332   }
02333   return;
02334 }
02335 
02336 void MainWindow::iconPaste_Click(void){
02337 
02338   if (!twPrograms->currentItem())
02339       return;
02340 
02341   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02342   bool fexists=FALSE, ok;
02343   QString newName, prefix_name, dir_name;
02344 
02345   if (iconBuffer.names.count()>0){
02346       for (int i=0; i<iconBuffer.names.count(); i++){
02347         // Checking for not unic names
02348         newName = iconBuffer.names.at(i);
02349         fexists=FALSE;
02350         ok=FALSE;
02351 
02352         if (!treeItem->parent()){
02353             prefix_name = treeItem->text(0);
02354             dir_name = "";
02355         } else {
02356             prefix_name = treeItem->parent()->text(0);
02357             dir_name = treeItem->text(0);
02358         }
02359 
02360         while (db_icon->isExistsByName(prefix_name, dir_name, newName)){
02361             newName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Sorry. It seems file already exists."), tr("Sorry. It seems file already exists.<br>Please rename it, or cancel paste operation."), QLineEdit::Normal, iconBuffer.names.at(i) , &ok);
02362             if (!ok){
02363               return;
02364             }
02365         }
02366 
02367         switch (iconBuffer.move){
02368                         case FALSE:
02369             if (!db_icon->copyIcon(iconBuffer.names.at(i), iconBuffer.prefix_name, iconBuffer.dir_name, newName, prefix_name, dir_name))
02370               return;
02371             break;
02372                         case TRUE:
02373             if (!db_icon->updateIcon(newName, db_prefix->getId(prefix_name), db_dir->getId(dir_name, prefix_name), db_prefix->getId(iconBuffer.prefix_name), db_dir->getId(iconBuffer.dir_name, iconBuffer.prefix_name), iconBuffer.names.at(i)))
02374               return;
02375             break;
02376         }
02377 
02378       }
02379       iconBuffer.names.clear();
02380       iconBuffer.dir_name="";
02381       iconBuffer.prefix_name="";
02382       iconBuffer.move=false;
02383   }
02384 
02385   twPrograms_ItemClick(twPrograms->currentItem(), 0);
02386   return;
02387 }
02388 
02389 void MainWindow::iconOption_Click(void){
02390   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02391   QListWidgetItem *iconItem = lstIcons->currentItem();
02392 
02393   if (!treeItem)
02394       return;
02395   if (!iconItem)
02396       return;
02397 
02398   IconSettings *iconAddWizard;
02399 
02400   if (treeItem->parent()){
02401       iconAddWizard = new IconSettings(treeItem->parent()->text(0), treeItem->text(0), iconItem->text());
02402   } else {
02403       iconAddWizard = new IconSettings(treeItem->text(0), "", iconItem->text());
02404   }
02405 
02406   if (iconAddWizard->exec() == QDialog::Accepted){
02407       // Updating icons view
02408       twPrograms_ItemClick(treeItem, 0);
02409   }
02410   return;
02411 }

02413 void MainWindow::xdgOpenIconDir_Click(void){
02414   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02415   QListWidgetItem *iconItem = lstIcons->currentItem();
02416   QStringList result;
02417   if (!treeItem)
02418       return;
02419   if (!iconItem)
02420       return;
02421 
02422   if (treeItem->parent()){
02423       result = db_icon->getByName(treeItem->parent()->text(0), treeItem->text(0), iconItem->text());
02424   } else {
02425       result = db_icon->getByName(treeItem->text(0), "", iconItem->text());
02426   }
02427 
02428   QStringList args;
02429   args<<result.at(4);
02430   CoreLib->runProcess(CoreLib->getWhichOut("xdg-open"), args, "", FALSE);
02431 
02432   return;
02433 }
02434 
02435 void MainWindow::xdgOpenPrefixDir_Click(void){
02436   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02437 
02438   QString result;
02439   if (!treeItem)
02440       return;
02441 
02442   if (treeItem->parent()){
02443       result = db_prefix->getPath(treeItem->parent()->text(0));
02444   } else {
02445       result = db_prefix->getPath(treeItem->text(0));
02446   }
02447 
02448   QStringList args;
02449   args<<result;
02450   CoreLib->runProcess(CoreLib->getWhichOut("xdg-open"), args, "", FALSE);
02451 
02452   return;
02453 }

02476 void MainWindow::winefileOpenIconDir_Click(void){
02477   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02478   QListWidgetItem *iconItem = lstIcons->currentItem();
02479   QStringList result;
02480   if (!treeItem)
02481       return;
02482   if (!iconItem)
02483       return;
02484 
02485   if (treeItem->parent()){
02486       result = db_icon->getByName(treeItem->parent()->text(0), treeItem->text(0), iconItem->text());
02487       CoreLib->runWineBinary("winefile", result.at(4) + "/", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
02488   } else {
02489       result = db_icon->getByName(treeItem->text(0), "", iconItem->text());
02490       CoreLib->runWineBinary("winefile", result.at(4) + "/", treeItem->text(0));
02491   }
02492 
02493   return;
02494 }
02495 
02496 void MainWindow::winefileOpenPrefixDir_Click(void){
02497   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02498 
02499   QString result;
02500   if (!treeItem)
02501       return;
02502 
02503   if (treeItem->parent()){
02504       result = db_prefix->getPath(treeItem->parent()->text(0));
02505       CoreLib->runWineBinary("winefile", result + "/", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
02506   } else {
02507       result = db_prefix->getPath(treeItem->text(0));
02508       CoreLib->runWineBinary("winefile", result + "/", treeItem->text(0));
02509   }
02510 
02511   return;
02512 }

02533 void MainWindow::dirAdd_Click(void){
02534   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02535   QTreeWidgetItem *prefixItem;
02536 
02537   if (!treeItem->text(0).isEmpty()){
02538       bool ok;
02539       QString dirname = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Enter new directory name"), tr("Directory name:"), QLineEdit::Normal, "" , &ok);
02540 
02541       if (ok && !dirname.isEmpty()){
02542 
02543         if (treeItem->parent()){
02544             if (db_dir->isExistsByName(treeItem->parent()->text(0), dirname)){
02545               QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, but directory named %1 already exists.").arg(dirname));
02546               return;
02547             }
02548 
02549             if (!db_dir->addDir(treeItem->parent()->text(0), dirname))
02550               return;
02551             prefixItem = new QTreeWidgetItem(treeItem->parent());
02552         } else {
02553             if (db_dir->isExistsByName(treeItem->text(0), dirname)){
02554               QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, but directory named %1 already exists.").arg(dirname));
02555               return;
02556             }
02557 
02558             if (!db_dir->addDir(treeItem->text(0), dirname))
02559               return;
02560             prefixItem = new QTreeWidgetItem(treeItem);
02561         }
02562 
02563         prefixItem->setText(0, dirname);
02564         prefixItem->setIcon(0, loadIcon("data/folder.png"));
02565       }
02566   }
02567   return;
02568 }

02570 void MainWindow::dirUnmount_Click(void){
02571   /*
02572             Request for unmounting cdrom drve described at wine prefix settings
02573       */
02574 
02575   bool ret;
02576   if (twPrograms->currentItem()){
02577       if (twPrograms->currentItem()->parent()){
02578         ret=CoreLib->umountImage(twPrograms->currentItem()->parent()->text(0));
02579       } else {
02580         ret=CoreLib->umountImage(twPrograms->currentItem()->text(0));
02581       }
02582   }
02583 
02584   if (ret){
02585       statusBar()->showMessage(QObject::tr("Drive successfully umounted."));
02586   } else {
02587       statusBar()->showMessage(QObject::tr("Fail to umount drive."));
02588   }
02589   return;
02590 }

02592 void MainWindow::dirMountOther_Click(void){
02593   /*
02594       Request for unmounting cdrom drve described at wine prefix settings
02595       */
02596 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
02597   QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open ISO or NRG Image file"), HOME_PATH, tr("iso and nrg files (*.iso *.nrg)"));
02598 #endif
02599 
02600 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
02601   QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open ISO Image file"), HOME_PATH, tr("iso files (*.iso)"));
02602 #endif
02603 
02604   if(fileName.isEmpty()){
02605       return;
02606   }
02607 
02608   bool ret;
02609   if (twPrograms->currentItem()){
02610       if (twPrograms->currentItem()->parent()){
02611         ret=CoreLib->mountImage(fileName, twPrograms->currentItem()->parent()->text(0));
02612       } else {
02613         ret=CoreLib->mountImage(fileName, twPrograms->currentItem()->text(0));
02614       }
02615   }
02616 
02617   if (ret){
02618       statusBar()->showMessage(QObject::tr("%1 successfully mounted.").arg(fileName));
02619   } else {
02620       statusBar()->showMessage(QObject::tr("Fail to mount %1.").arg(fileName));
02621   }
02622 
02623   return;
02624 }

02647 void MainWindow::dirRename_Click(void){
02648   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02649 
02650   if (!treeItem)
02651       return;
02652 
02653   if (treeItem->parent()){
02654       bool ok = FALSE;
02655       QString newName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Enter new name for directory"), tr("Directory name:"), QLineEdit::Normal, treeItem->text(0) , &ok);
02656 
02657       if (ok && !newName.isEmpty()){
02658         while (db_dir->isExistsByName(treeItem->parent()->text(0), newName)){
02659             newName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Sorry. It seems directory already exists."), tr("Sorry. It seems directory already exists.<br>Please rename it, or cancel rename operation."), QLineEdit::Normal, newName, &ok);
02660             if ((!ok) || (newName.isEmpty())){
02661               return;
02662             }
02663         }
02664         db_dir->renameDir(treeItem->text(0), treeItem->parent()->text(0), newName);
02665         treeItem->setText(0, newName);
02666       }
02667 
02668   }
02669   return;
02670 }
02671 
02672 void MainWindow::dirDelete_Click(void){
02673   QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
02674   treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02675 
02676   if (!treeItem)
02677       return;
02678 
02679   if (treeItem->parent()){
02680 
02681       if (QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Q4Wine"), tr("Do you really wish delete folder named \"%1\" and all associated icons?\n").arg(twPrograms->currentItem()->text(0)),
02682                                            QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No)==QMessageBox::Yes){
02683 
02684         if (db_icon->delIcon(treeItem->parent()->text(0), treeItem->text(0), ""))
02685             if(db_dir->delDir(treeItem->parent()->text(0), treeItem->text(0)))
02686               treeItem->parent()->removeChild (treeItem);
02687         twPrograms_ItemClick(twPrograms->currentItem(), 0);
02688       }
02689   }
02690 
02691   return;
02692 }
02693 
02694 void MainWindow::runAutostart(void){
02695   QList<QStringList> iconsList, prefixList;
02696 
02697   prefixList = db_prefix->getFields();
02698   for (int i = 0; i < prefixList.size(); ++i) {
02699       iconsList = db_icon->getByPrefixAndDirName(prefixList.at(i).at(1), "autostart");
02700       for (int j = 0; j < iconsList.size(); ++j) {
02701         CoreLib->runIcon(prefixList.at(i).at(1), "autostart", iconsList.at(j).at(1));
02702       }
02703   }
02704   return;
02705 }
